meta.title: Configure PostgreSQL database schema and migrations

task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 2 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Design and implement the database schema for teams, users, tasks, and invites with proper indexes and constraints using sqlx migrations
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create migrations directory: `sqlx migrate add initial_schema` 2. Define tables: - users (id uuid PRIMARY KEY, email varchar UNIQUE, password_hash varchar, created_at timestamptz) - teams (id uuid PRIMARY KEY, name varchar, description text, created_at timestamptz, deleted_at timestamptz) - team_members (team_id uuid, user_id uuid, role varchar, PRIMARY KEY(team_id, user_id)) - tasks (id uuid PRIMARY KEY, team_id uuid, title varchar, description text, assignee_id uuid, status varchar, due_date timestamptz, created_at timestamptz, deleted_at timestamptz) - invites (id uuid PRIMARY KEY, team_id uuid, token varchar UNIQUE, expires_at timestamptz) 3. Add indexes on foreign keys, deleted_at, status, due_date 4. Create sqlx connection pool in src/infra/database.rs 5. Implement health check query

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-2): Configure PostgreSQL database schema and migrations

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Run `sqlx migrate run` against test database. Verify all tables created with `\dt` in psql. Test connection pool with simple SELECT query
